Text: oh hard SAME itâ€™s so annoying... i literally binge chocolate in front of them but i still get the stupid talks and accusations of having anorexia

Author: sipapito
Text: I definitely feel this. I love my family so much but I get comments about food no matter what I do! Like "oh, seconds? You've always been able to eat so much, you're going to end up overweight like us! It's in your genes!" or "you have to eat more than that, what are you trying to starve yourself??" It's like no matter what I do someone says something about my food and I get super upset about it.
